message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEALTERNATIVEID_DRE_IDTYPE_TYPECODE
message.locale: This alternative ID type already exists for "%1s".

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEALTID_XRV_PRIMARYALTID_ACTIVE
message.locale: You cannot delete the primary alternative ID. Please create another alternative ID and assign it as the primary alternative ID before attempting to delete this alternative ID.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEALTID_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_CREATE
message.locale: New alternate ID details cannot be added for a client that is currently marked as a duplicate.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEALTID_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_MODIFY
message.locale: Alternate ID details of a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEALTID_XRV_ID_TYPE_CONCERNTYPE_OVERLAP
message.locale: The identification details entered already exist for another %1c. Please correct the details or review for duplicate %1c details.
